meanings.sent1: The overbright light hurt my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The overbright sun made it hard to see.
meanings.sent3: The overbright neon sign was like a spotlight on the street.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was so overbright, it lit up the room.
meanings.sent5: The overbright colors of the painting were almost blinding.

meanings.sent1: The overbright headlights of the car were blinding.
meanings.sent2: The overbright fireworks lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The overbright reflection on the water looked like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The overbright stage lights made the performance unforgettable.
